name: Woodwose
description: The Woodwose is a medium-sized humanoid with a strong build and nature-inspired characteristics. It excels in close combat due to its physical strength and has a unique connection to the natural world.
memorable: Its ability to communicate with beasts and plants makes it an intriguing presence in forested areas.
goals: To thrive in natural environments and protect the forest.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other fey creatures or woodland beings.
environment: Typically found in forested or natural settings.
strengths: High strength allows it to excel in melee combat.
weaknesses: Low charisma hampers social interactions significantly.
attacks: Attacks with a club or a shortbow, and can enhance its attacks through spells.
most_powerful_ability: Can cast Entangle to control the battlefield and restrict enemies.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 14, enabling it to notice hidden creatures effectively.
skills: Proficient in nature, perception, stealth, and survival.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed
Can cast Shillelagh at will to enhance melee attacks
Can cast Pass Without Trace to aid stealth
Can communicate with plants and beasts
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom; can cast Shillelagh at will and Pass Without Trace multiple times per day.
test_queries: agile humanoid that can control plants
medium-sized creature strong in melee combat
spellcaster that speaks with beasts and plants
chaotic neutral creature found in forests
